meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brad Snyder Amelia Reinwald Sam Scovill Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7429.

td.p: Brad Snyder, a consulting electrical engineer from Port Deposit, Maryland
Amelia Reinwald, an abuse prevention educator from Irving, Texas
Sam Scovill, a G.I.S. technician from Oklahoma City, Oklahoma (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,001)

tr.td: MEET THE BEAGLES
CHEMISTRY
DOUBLE L
(Alex: Just like Jeopardy!, we'll deal with...)
TV SHOWS THAT DEBUTED IN 1984
THE WEDDING RECEPTION
OUT OF TOWN GUESTS
